channel.title: [PI] run.bat help
channel.description:
[pi]when i try run my server im geting
'java' is not recognized as an interal or external command, operable program or batch file..
help plz and this is whats in my run do i need to change out am runnning jdk1.7.0_51 java
@echo off title color 0a java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause
thanks

item.title: [PI] run.bat help
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Add Environmental Variables to your computer, and that will fix all your issues.

or
You can change the word “java” to the location of your java.exe:
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_51\bin” <Use that (with quotes) if you installed 64 bit java on your 64 bit pc or if you installed 32 bit java on your 32 bit pc.
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0_51\bin” <Use that if you installed 32 bit java on your 32 bit pc.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] run.bat help
item.dc:creator: @pkryan pkryan
item.description:
@pkryan wrote:

[pi]when i try run my server im geting

‘java’ is not recognized as an interal or external command,
operable program or batch file…

help plz and this is whats in my run do i need to change out am runnning jdk1.7.0_51 java

@echo off
title
color 0a
java -Xmx800m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause

thanks
